LanguageData.PowerLogicSwitches.label: Power Logic Switches
LanguageData.PowerLogicSwitches.description: Allow for the Building of Power Logic Switches
LanguageData.PowerLogicSensors.label: Power Logic Sensors
LanguageData.PowerLogicSensors.description: Allow for the Building of Proximity Sensors, Zone Switches, Entangled switches
LanguageData.PowerLogicRemotes.label: Power Logic Remote Sensors
LanguageData.PowerLogicRemotes.description: Allow for the Building of Remote Proximity Sensors, Repeaters and Remote Switches
LanguageData.PowerLogicRemotesAdvanced.label: Power Logic Remote Advanced Logic
LanguageData.PowerLogicRemotesAdvanced.description: Allow for the Building of Advanced Power Logic Remote Devices, such as Repeaters and Transmitters
LanguageData.PowerLogicRadarWifi.label: Power Logic Radar Logic
LanguageData.PowerLogicRadarWifi.description: Allow for the Building of a Radar based transmitter
LanguageData.PowerLogicLaserTech.label: Power Logic Laser Tech
LanguageData.PowerLogicLaserTech.description: Allow for the Building of lasers, laser reflective mirrors and laser triggered switches
LanguageData.PowerLogicRemotesMultiChannel.label: Power Logic Remote Multichannel Logic
LanguageData.PowerLogicRemotesMultiChannel.descriptio: Upgrades existing Power Logic Remote Devices to utilise up to two channels instead of one
